Reviews.Content: I would not put a dog in here We were 'dumped' in this disgusing place after arriving at Champlung Mas to find that they had overbooked and did not have rooms (which we had booked and paid for 10 months previously) for our party of 9. We were quickly pushed into the Champlung Mas bus and driven to Puri Etnik. Now, I am an experienced budget traveller who has, among other things, backpacked for many months through India and have stayed at some pretty seedy places. However, Puri Etnik is quite simply the filthiest, most run down, hazardous and down right ugly place I have ever seen. After looking at room after room, we refused point blank to stay at this hotel. My advice to any traveller is to avoid this place like the plague.....
Reviews.Author: queenofpuddings

Reviews.Content: Flithy, dirty, never stay here       Mould on wall near bed
Reviews.Author: Snookystraveltips
